section.title: update_user( integer, text )
section.para:
Function Properties
Language Return Type
SQL integer
Takes int4 which is users.id and text which is username. Will update username based on id. Username is unique
UPDATE users SET username = '$2' WHERE id = $1; SELECT 1;
